casebody.data:
Desiree King, by and through her Guardian ad Litem, G. Elvin Small, III; and Amber M. Clark, Individually, Plaintiffs,
v.
Albemarle Hospital Authority d/b/a Albemarle Health/Albemarle Hospital; Sentara Albemarle Regional Medical Center, LLC d/b/a Sentara Albemarle Medical Center; Northeastern Ob/Gyn, Ltd.; Barbara Ann Carter, M.D.; and Angela McWalter, CNM, Defendants. No. COA15-1190 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: September 6, 2016

REVERSED AND REMANDED.
